'''Laummas the Liegelord''' was a [[Hlontar]] [[lich]] allied to the [[Army of Darkness]].
document_data.History:
Laummas allied with [[Malimshaer]] and fought in the [[Weeping War]]. He fought in the decisive battle in [[Hammer 25]]â€“[[Hammer 29|29]] of [[712 DR]] against the [[Harpers|Harpers at Twilight]] where most of the Harpers died. However, Laummas was destroyed by the Harper leader [[Dathlue Mistwinter]].

Laummas knew about the ''[[Gatekeeper's Crystal]]'' and possessed the ''[[mantle stone of Vhyridaan]]''.
document_data.Relationship: Laummas was the master of the traitor [[Nezras]].
